entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.WebWorkerTest.ManagedDelay test failure #96585
  • possibly memory leak in .net 8 #96581
  • MemoryExtensions.Split with white space seprator and StringSplitOptions.TrimEntries trims the seprator of last range if destination isn't enough long #96579
  • Request: I really want a best and official .NET PDF library from dotnet team. #96576
  • Problem with ComInterfaceGenerator.Tests build #96572

Closed

  • Potential redundant field in MethodDesc #96474
  • After Using System.Text.Json, Code Execution Differs in PublishAot. #96548

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix some IDExx analyzer suggestions in System.Text.RegularExpressions #96584
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [NativeAOT] Clean up some of the ARM32 bit rotten code #96583
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix links in features.md #96582
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Avoid cloning cold descendant loops quadratically #96580
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix native memory leak on OCSP_Response #96578
    area-System.Security
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix native memory leak on OCSP_Response #96577
    area-System.Security
  • Improve performance of `Enumerable.ToDictionary()` #96574
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Using HashSet instead of Dictionary multiple times #96573
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • PGO: Profiled SequenceEqual #96571
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Convert HELPER_METHOD_FRAME to QCalls (5/N) #96526
    needs-area-label
  • [browser][MT] fix CaptureContextFromParameter and SealJSImportCapturing #96504
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix native memory leak on OCSP_Response #96561
    area-System.Net.Security
  • JIT: Remove `BBJ_RETURN` loop cloning quirk #96555
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove IV analysis quirk in loop cloning #96563
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Replace LINQ's ArrayBuilder, LargeArrayBuilder, and SparseArrayBuilder with new SegmentedArrayBuilder #96570
    area-System.Linq, 9.0.0
  • Allow specifying IndentCharacter and IndentSize when writing JSON #95292
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • ObjWriter in C# #95876
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Adding vectorized implementations of Log2 to Vector64/128/256/512 #96455
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • React to new Package Validation change #94432
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser][MT] Use auto thread dispatch in HTTP & WS #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Use pattern value in the summary for the generated regex method. #96488
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0 #95980
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Enable On Stack Replacement #96558
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm] p/invoke and interop improvements #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • Add debug-only use of new AssemblyBuilder.Save in Regex.CompileToAssembly #96462
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Updating Sum() implementation for Vector128 and Vector256 + adding lowering for Vector512 #95568
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
